import React,{useRef} from 'react' import {Card, Form} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import "../styles.css" const USER_REGEX = /^[a-zA-Z0-9._:$!%-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9.-]+.[a-zA-Z]$/; const PWD_REGEX = /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[!@#$%]).{8,24}$/; const REGISTER_URL = '/register'; const Register = () => { const emailRef =useRef() const passwordRef =useRef() const passwordConfirmRef =useRef() const { signup } =useAuth() return ( <>
